_source.text: 12:31-13:8), better than all the gifts of prophesy-of interpreting what ought and ought not be believed-is that of love-of coming together; not breaking up in camps, chanting "my way or the highway", but building up in community, chanting "let's build that new thruway".

text: 12:31-13:8), **better** **than** all the gifts of prophesy-of interpreting what ought and ought not be
believed-is that of love-of coming **together**; not breaking up in camps, chanting "my way or the highway
", but building up in **community**, chanting "let's build that new thruway".

_source.text: A community is better and more valuable for all involved when members work together.

text: A **community** **is** **better** and more valuable for all involved when members work **together**.

_source.text: A community land trust would bring together stakeholders to give close attention to specific sites (either contiguous or scattered), doing far better than any absentee landlord could to care for the property.

text: A **community** land trust would bring **together** stakeholders to give close attention to specific sites
(either contiguous or scattered), doing far **better** **than** any absentee landlord could to care for the property.

_source.text: 98: "We do not prefer any of the saintly men among the Community over any of the Prophets but rather we say that any one of the Prophets is better than all the awliya' put together."

text: rather we say that any one of the Prophets **is** **better** **than** all the awliya' put **together**."

_source.text: A community of "poor" people is better able to show solidarity with the poor and to point to the very heart of evangelization because it concretely presents the transforming power of the Beatitudes.

_source.text: A few notes, however, may be usefully extracted from the later minutes, which, though relating to a period of time somewhat in advance of the particular epoch we are considering, will fit in here better than at any later stage, and it must not escape our recollection, that the Alnwick Lodge never surrendered its independence, and moreover, from first to last, was an operative rather than a speculative fraternity.

_source.text: After battling through a rough patch last season, Brian spent the harsh Illinois winter gathering together some of the best parts and people in the LSX community to bring his Trans Am back better than ever.

text: After battling through a rough patch last season, Brian spent the harsh Illinois winter gathering **together** some of the best parts and people in the LSX **community** to bring his Trans Am back **better** **than** ever.
